trans-unit.resname: V10·14 | Sword of Body and Mind | Card Name
V10·14 | Sword of Body and Mind | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has protection from green and from blue.
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物得+2/+2且具有反绿保护与反蓝保护。

trans-unit.resname: V10·14 | Sword of Body and Mind | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, you create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token and that player mills ten cards.
trans-unit.target: 每当佩带此武具的生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，你派出一个2/2绿色的狼衍生生物，且该牌手磨十张牌。

trans-unit.resname: V10·14 | Sword of Body and Mind | Card Text | Paragraph 3
